name: Subsets
headline: AI-driven Retention Automation for subscription media businesses.
description:
Subsets is the leading AI-driven retention automation platform purpose-built for commercial teams in subscription businesses.

Subscription media companies like The Atlantic, TuneIn, Daily Mail, McClatchy, and The Athletic use Subsets to predict churn, experiment with retention strategies, and confidently automate what works to drive engagement and retention.

Launched out of Y Combinator‚Äôs 2023 Summer batch in San Francisco, Subsets is building the AI-driven retention platform for subscription businesses focused on sustainable growth and profitability.

founders.name: Martin Johnsen, Founder
founders.description: Martin is the co-founder and CEO of Subsets (S23). Previously worked in management consulting helping large organizations scale AI initiatives across different business functions and industries. Holds an MSc in Mathematical modeling from The Technical University of Denmark.

founders.name: Oliver Brandt, Founder
founders.description: Oliver is the co-founder and CTO of Subsets.com (S23). Previously worked as an ML engineer at DSV (the world 3rd largest transport and logistics company) leading the development of their MLOps platform and building products. Holds an MSc in Data Science from The Technical University of Denmark and loves sailing‚õµ, divingü§ø  and Skiing‚õ∑Ô∏è

founders.name: Nikolai Skelbo, Founder
founders.description:
I'm Nikolai, co-founder and COO at Subsets. Before we founded Subsets, I spent two years at Contractbook building the Revenue Operations team, and leading growth initiatives such as Account Based Marketing (ABM). 

Spending most of my time in front of my laptop, I enjoy doing all sorts of sports and being in the nature in my spare time :)

# AI-driven retention experimentation and automation for subscription media
# AI-driven retention automation for subscription media
Leverage AI to predict churn and uncover upsell opportunities. Easily run experiments and A/B tests. See the impact on retention and engagement, and seamlessly turn insights into automations. Designed for commercial teams ‚Äì no coding required.
[Request a demo](https://www.subsets.com/</demo>)
Backed by
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b30317605b77f6259aa80f/677be993a0a101c421a85d73_Hero_bg.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b30317605b77f6259aa80f/67606cf63ea20f1c13395dce_Logo.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b30317605b77f6259aa80f/67606cf655a81dce34c2b815_Logo-1.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b30317605b77f6259aa80f/67606cf65ecdb5d5d70e3c50_image.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b30317605b77f6259aa80f/678e4e606c76c7037417bc3c_McClutchy.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b30317605b77f6259aa80f/67606cf6230ab113ada1093c_Logo-2.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b30317605b77f6259aa80f/67606cf6cb90a47b18cb8e4e_Logo-3.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b30317605b77f6259aa80f/678e8370a8c4c744da834ea5_TuneIn.png)
## Subsets is purpose-built for commercial teams to increase retention without requiring engineers
Empowering commercial teams with AI-driven automation to streamline the entire retention workflow and turn successful experiments into scalable automations.
[DiscoverDiscover AI-generated retention audiences that cover the full subscription lifecycle.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b30317605b77f6259aa80f/67637cdba7d6ca2b6b062a83_tabs%20image.svg)](https://www.subsets.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[UnderstandUnderstand the behavioural drivers leading to churn across the lifecycle stages.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b30317605b77f6259aa80f/677c1cb290f979c4d8a47486_Undestand.svg)](https://www.subsets.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[ExperimentRun A/B tests and analyze the impact on engagement and retention metrics automatically.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b30317605b77f6259aa80f/67771c3315fdaf7e33a7554f_Experiment.svg)](https://www.subsets.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[AutomateTurn successful experiments into automations that optimize subscriber revenue streams.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b30317605b77f6259aa80f/676efce8809fecee0dd4f3c1_Automate.svg)](https://www.subsets.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b30317605b77f6259aa80f/676efce7058ff5f9a4e15e47_Discover.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b30317605b77f6259aa80f/677c1cb290f979c4d8a47486_Undestand.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b30317605b77f6259aa80f/677be736ed65f0e10cd857e4_Experiment.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b30317605b77f6259aa80f/676efce8809fecee0dd4f3c1_Automate.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b30317605b77f6259aa80f/67607d6f23774f82f31c2be0_dailymail.png)
The depth and breadth of the results analysis we can generate from Subsets has been invaluable. We are aiming to turn validated experiments into 'always on' and let Subsets select subscribers for targeting and trigger the campaigns.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b30317605b77f6259aa80f/67607cabad6dd168a391aca0_Andy%20Wilson.png)
Andy Wilson
Head of Subscriber Retention @ Daily Mail
## Modeled around your data and workflow
Subsets trains a unique machine learning model on top of your proprietary 1st party data, enabling you to activate the insights across your engagement channels.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b30317605b77f6259aa80f/67607e6d0a6db098005aa5f2_mode%20data%20image.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b30317605b77f6259aa80f/676f71bf5661c9db220fb8ae_data%20workflow.png)
## Grow revenue from your existing subscribers
Request a demo to see how Subsets empowers your commercial team with AI-driven retention automation
[Request a demo](https://www.subsets.com/</demo>)
## Run experiments and turn impactful retention flows into automations using AI
Enable commercial teams to drive experimentation culture, make confident decisions, and automate analysis across key metrics with an intuitive, user-friendly UI.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b30317605b77f6259aa80f/676f5f2d43015d2cbdd6997d_Find%20the%20most%20important%20audiences%20with%20AI.svg)
### Find the most important audiences with AI
Use AI to find the most important retention audiences within your subscription base. Discover audiences with a simple click.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b30317605b77f6259aa80f/677bf3bc225b8e5a478d2124_Uncover%20contextual%20behavior.svg)
### Uncover contextual behavior
Benefit from explainable AI to uncover the behavioral drivers behind every audience that drives the retention risk.‍‍
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b30317605b77f6259aa80f/677be50be90ac466e3683d83_Run%20sophisticated%20retention%20experiments.svg)
### Run sophisticated retention experiments
Run experiments with just a click of a button and automatically track the impact on retention, engagement, and lifetime value.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b30317605b77f6259aa80f/676f5f2d071d3c0d2699cd3a_Automate%20successful%20experiments%20confidently%20.svg)
### Automate successful experiments confidently
Detect when experiments deliver a significant impact across preferred metrics and turn them into automations.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b30317605b77f6259aa80f/67a387a032dab9526a630af4_Logo.png)
We have had a great experience working with Subsets to manage churn and retention in our subscription business. The platform helps us take a proactive approach, continuously introducing new initiatives to optimize our retention strategies.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b30317605b77f6259aa80f/67a388a8dec149668d0a8a78_Profile%20Image.png)
Camilla Vilby-Mokvist
Marketing Automation Manager @ B√∏rsen

Learn how leading subscription media businesses manage retention with AI.

generated_description:
# Subsets Overview

**Company Name:** Subsets  
**Founded:** 2023  
**Location:** Copenhagen, Denmark  
**Team Size:** 7 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** S23  

## Mission
Subsets aims to revolutionize the subscription media landscape with its AI-driven retention automation platform. Designed specifically for commercial teams, the platform focuses on increasing customer engagement and retention, thereby fostering sustainable growth for subscription businesses.

## What They Do
Subsets provides cutting-edge solutions that empower subscription media companies like The Atlantic, TuneIn, Daily Mail, McClatchy, and The Athletic to:
- **Predict Churn:** Use AI to identify potential subscription cancellations before they happen.
- **Experiment with Retention Strategies:** Easily run A/B tests and analyze the results to see what resonates with subscribers.
- **Automate Proven Strategies:** Turn successful experiments into automated workflows without needing engineering support.

By leveraging proprietary first-party data, Subsets custom-trains machine learning models that surface actionable insights tailored to each business‚Äôs unique needs.

## Backing and Support
Subsets has already secured $1.65 million in funding to further develop its platform. It‚Äôs gaining traction by positioning itself as a vital tool for those in the subscription business looking to optimize their revenue from existing customers without the need for complex engineering interventions.

## Key Features
1. **Audience Insight:** Understand your most important audiences throughout their subscription lifecycle.
2. **Experimentation Made Easy:** Run experiments in a user-friendly interface and automate analysis across key metrics.
3. **Retention Automation:** Streamline successful retention strategies into scalable automations that actively engage subscribers.

## Notable Quotes
- Andy Wilson, Head of Subscriber Retention at Daily Mail, praises the platform for its comprehensive results analysis and ability to keep campaigns 'always on.'
- Camilla Vilby-Mokvist, Marketing Automation Manager at B√∏rsen, highlights how Subsets allows for a proactive approach in managing churn.

## Labels
- **Tags:** Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, B2B, Enterprise Software

## Conclusion
Subsets is positioning itself as a leader in the burgeoning field of retention automation for subscription media. If you're in this space and looking to optimize your strategies without the technical overhead, Subsets could be just what you need.

**Website:** [Subsets](https://www.subsets.com)
